channel.title: Aliens vs Marines Gamemode?
channel.description:
I wonder what a Aliens vs Marines gamemode would be like in BM?
A while back I saw this video of a extra bonus mission for Decay: [youtube.com/watch?v=kto8GExY7OI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kto8GExY7OI)
As you can see you can play as a Vortigaunt. I thought this was amazing so that got me thinking, what it BM had a gamemode where aliens had to fight marines?
You could play as different types of aliens (Vortigaunt, Alien Grunts and Houndeyes)

item.title: Aliens vs Marines Gamemode?
item.dc:creator: Turret_Cube
item.description:
Kenley:

That would be sooo cool!

But it’s not going to happen, because letting players be aliens would probably require reworking a whole new version of the alien abilities just for the players, for balancing purposes and to make them more fun. They’d have to make viewmodels for the various alien hands. Crowbar Collective are already very busy, so the only way you’d see this happen would be if some third-party modders created the game mode themselves.

Until then, we’ll just have to stick to Natural Selection.

The only aliens with hand models will be the Vortigaunts, Controller, Gargantua and Zombies. In fact if you look in BM’s files you can find a weapon called “zombiemelee”

1280×800
